name: karrot
description: Karrot is a community organizing platform focused on food sharing and mutual aid. The backend powers groups, activities, messaging and notifications, enabling local communities to coordinate pickups and events using self hosted instances.

features.title: Group Management
features.description: Create and manage community groups with member roles and permissions. Organize local initiatives

features.title: Location Management
features.description: Map pickup locations and meeting points for easy navigation. Help members find places

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email and push notifications for pickups, events, and messages. Keep members informed

features.title: Member Profiles
features.description: User profiles with activity history and trust indicators. Build community reputation
